jobs.title: Ресепшн
jobs.description: Кассын орлогыг нягтлан бодох бүртгэлийн мөрдөгдөж байгаа журмуудын дагуу хөтөлж, кассын орлогын үнэн зөв байдлыг хариуцан ажиллах үүрэгтэй.

resp.title: Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

reqs.title: Excellent knowledge of browser troubleshooting and debugging practices and techniques
Knowledge of graphics software such as Adobe Suite, Photoshop etc.
Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company’s success
Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
Good time-management skills
Great interpersonal and communication skills
BA in Computer Science or similar relevant field

skills.title: Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
The ability to work effectively as part of a team is important, since front-end web designers may work closely with marketing staff as well as other web developers
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them

jobs.title: Зээлийн ажилтан /Хан-Уул салбарт/
jobs.description: Зээлийн судалгаа шинжилгээ хийх, бүтээгдэхүүн үйлчилгээг борлуулах, олгосон зээлд хяналт тавих, зэрэг ажлын байрны тодорхойлолтын дагуу

jobs.title: Analyst
jobs.description: The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data analysis, statistics, and research. The Analyst will be responsible for collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data to identify trends and patterns. They will also be responsible for developing and implementing data-driven solutions to business problems.Collect, clean, and analyze data from a variety of sources(primary & secondary sources)Identify trends and patterns in dataDevelop and implement data-driven solutions to business problemsWork with stakeholders to understand their needs and communicate the results of data analysisStay up-to-date on the latest data science techniques and technologies
